categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Charros IV, also known as Charros, was a planet located in the galaxy's Mid Rim. During the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, the Alliance was forced to retreat from its failed Mid Rim Offensive, an operation by the Alliance and the Mid Rim revolutionaries to take control of the Mid Rim. The Alliance was forced to retreat from many worlds, including Charros IV. Several revolutionaries evacuated with Alliance forces, although many decided to remain on their planets to harass the Empire.
